title: ranked flex
body: if u hit gold on flex will u only get the gold border on flex games? or blind pick or solo/duo as well?

replies.body: Not sure here!  We haven't announced rewards just yet, so I couldn't say for sure.  Bookmark our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page for now for updates on that.  Hang tight, and good luck!
